title: R Lesson
text:
R: Intro to Remote Sensing
This lesson presents a basic R script for analyzing data.
Download R Script


x <- seq(0, 10, by = 0.1)
y <- sin(x)
plot(x, y, type="l", main="Sine Wave")

title: Remote Sensing Lessons
text:
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave')
plt.show()

title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to Remote Sensing Lessons
This site provides interactive tutorials in Python and R using real-world remote sensing data.
Choose a lesson from the navigation bar to get started.

title: Python Lesson
text:
Python: Intro to Remote Sensing
In this lesson, you will run and explore the following Python notebook.
Launch in Binder
Download Notebook

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("Sine Wave")
plt.show()
